atae/saab0509/P528350
{NA₄}KIŠIB Zeri DUMU {m}ta-a-ta TA ŠA₃ Libbi-ali Bel LU₂ SUM-ni   {m}{d}AŠ-bal-liṭ ARAD-šu₂ ša Zeri A {m}ta-a-ta u₂-piš-ma {m}qur-di-{d}gu-la DUMU Busasu {LU₂}še-lap-pa-a.a ina ŠA₃ 01 MA.NA 1/2 MA.NA KU₃.UD il-qi₂ kas-pu gam-mur ta-din LU₂ šu-a-te zar-pi laq-qi tu-a-ru de-e-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ la-aš₂-šu₂ man-nu ša₂ ina ur-kiš u₃ ma-te-ma i-zaq-qup-an-ni i-GIL-u-ni lu-u Zeri lu-u DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u DUMU-DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u ŠEŠ.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u DUMU-ŠEŠ.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u {LU₂}GAR-nu-šu₂ lu-u qur-ub-šu₂ lu-u mam₂-ma-nu-šu₂ ša₂ TA {m}qur-di-{d}gu-la DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ DUMU-DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ de-e-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ ub-ta-u-ni Adad MA.NA KU₃.UD LUH-u 01 MA.NA KU₃.GI sak-ru ina bur-ki Issar a-ši-bat Ninua GAR-an kas-pu a-na 10.MEŠ a-na EN.MEŠ-šu₂ GUR ina la de-ni-šu₂ DUG₄.DUG₄-ma la i-laq-qi ṣib-tu₂ be-en-nu a-na 01-me UD.ME sa-ar₂-tu₂ ina kal MU.AN.NA.MEŠ  IGI Mušezib-Aššur {LU₂}SANGA ša₂ Marduk IGI Aššur-abu-uṣur {LU₂} IGI Nabu-remanni {LU₂} ša₂ GAŠAN-KUR IGI Aššur-šezibanni {LU₂} ša₂ Issar ša₂ Ninua IGI Qibit-Aššur {LU₂} ša₂ ša₂ {d}hu-ru IGI x x-i {LU₂}GAL-še-lap-pa-a.a IGI {m}kab-ti-i IGI Aššur-balliṭ IGI Dilil-Issar IGI Nabu-ahu-iddina IGI {m}ha-di-li-pu-šu IGI Keni IGI {m}aš-šur-ARHUŠ-šuk-na IGI {m}TUKUL-ti-DINGIR-MEŠ IGI {m}bar-hu-x+x x Arahsamni UD-09-KAM₂ lim-me Sin-šarru-uṣur {LU₂}GAR.KUR Hindan
